ceremony.name: White / Church Wedding
ceremony.arrivalRecommendation: Please arrive 20 to 30 minutes early so everyone is seated before procession.
ceremony.address: 1118 N Mesa St, El Paso, TX 79902
ceremony.unpluggedPolicy: Please keep phones on silent and avoid blocking aisles during Mass.

reception.name: Reception / Traditional Wedding
reception.dinnerStyle: Meal selection is required in RSVP.
reception.culturalElements: Reception includes a traditional celebration and cultural moments.

policies.plusOne: Plus-ones are acceptable; please check with the couple.
policies.rsvpVerification: Guests must find their invitation and verify with a passphrase before completing RSVP.
policies.rsvpChangePolicy: If plans change after RSVP, contact the couple directly.

travel.transportation: Google Maps links are available for venues. Shuttle info is not provided.
travel.parking: Parking details are not published yet; check /travel for latest updates.
travel.hotels: Hotel recommendations will be shared with guests.

uploads.instructions: Scan the QR code, upload from your phone, and approved photos appear in the live gallery.

faq.question: What is the dress code and color of the day?
faq.answer: Sage green and dusty pink; dress elegantly for church and African Native / cultural attire for reception.

faq.question: What is the plus-one policy?
faq.answer: Plus-ones are acceptable; check with the couple.

faq.question: What time should guests arrive?
faq.answer: Please arrive 20 to 30 minutes early and avoid African time.

faq.question: What time zone is the event in?
Are there cultural elements in the celebration?
faq.answer: Yes, the reception includes traditional and cultural moments.

faq.question: Do you offer accessibility accommodations?
faq.answer: Please contact the couple directly for specific accessibility needs.

loveStory.howTheyMet: They met online, started with friendship, and built a long-distance relationship with intentional communication.
loveStory.proposal: The proposal happened during a vacation evening on a rooftop overlooking the city skyline.
loveStory.mostExcitedAbout: They are most excited about building a life together and choosing each other every day.
